provisions.title: Section 14
provisions.content:
14. The Council may with the approval of the Minister make Regulations.
regulations-
      (a) determining generally the conditions of service of
          officers and servants of the Council;
     (b) relating in particular, but without prejudice to the
         generality of the provisions of paragraphs (a) and (c),
         to-
                (i) the grant of pensions, gratuities and other
                    benefits to such officers and servants and
                    their dependants, and the grant of gratuities
                    and other benefits to the dependants or
                    estates of deceased officers and servants of

               (ii) the establishment and maintenance of sick
                    funds, superannuation funds and provident
                    funds, the contributions payable thereto and
                    the benefits receivable therefrom;
     (c) generally for the better carrying out of the purposes of
         this Act.
